overview: Follow The Broccoli is the story of Arthur Ibbet, a young songwriter, who is obsessed with Elizabeth Aard. In order to win her heart he sets out to become a Bingo Champion (she comes from a long line of Bingo Champions). Artâ€™s passion for music and obsession with bingo ultimately force him to make a decision as to whether or not he will be true to his own path.
title: Follow The Broccoli
